question: The 2017 Save Public Sector Banks Day (SPSBD) will be celebrated on which date in India?
explanation: The United Forum of Bank Unions decided to observe July 19, the 48th anniversary of nationalization of major banks, as Save public sector banks day. They wear a commemorative badge on the day, display posters in front of all branches, distribute leaflets and hold rallies/demonstrations at all centers across the country.
